casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Toby Ofield LOVE.
State of North Carolina
v.
Ronnie Love.
State of North Carolina
v.
Tino Love. No. 353P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 17, 2006. Peter Wood, for Toby Love. Irving Joyner, Durham, for Ronnie Love. John Keating Wiles, Raleigh, for Tino Love. Judith Tillman, Iain M. Stauffer, Assistant Attorney Generals, Mabel Y. Bullock, Special Deputy Attorney General, Robert F. Johnson, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 10th day of July 2006 by Defendant (Ronnie Love) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th day of August 2006."
